title: 서정길
content:
서정길은 서울
공과대학
화학공학과
교수이자
분자촉매 및 반응공학 연구실
장을 겸하고 있다.
연락처: 02-2220-0520 / jgseo@hanyang.ac.kr
홈페이지:
https://sites.google.com/site/materialscatalysis/home
목차
1
학력
2
동정
3
경력
4
수상
학력
Ph.D. : School of Chemical and Biological Engineering, Seoul National University (2011)
B.S.  : School of Chemical and Biological Engineering, Seoul National University (2005)
동정
2021 성동소방서 위험물 사고조사위원회 민간위원
경력
2020 - present, Associate Professor, Department of Chemical Engineering, Hanyang University
2016 - 2020, Associate Professor, Department of Energy Science and Technology, Myongji University
2018 - 2019, Visiting Professor, Department of Applied Chemistry, Waseda University (Collaborator: Prof. Yasushi Sekine)
2013 - 2016, Assistant Professor, Department of Energy Science and Technology, Myongji University
2012 - 2016, Assistant Professor, Department of Environmental Engineering and Energy, Myongji University
2011 - 2012, Research Staff Member, Samsung Advanced Institute of Technology (SAIT)
수상
Best Research Awrad, Myongji University, August 2019
Best Research Award, Myongji University, August 2016
Catalyst Research Award, Division of Catalyst, Korean Institute of Chemical Engineer, January 2011
Sinyang Academic Award, Sinyang Culture Foundation and College of Engineering, Seoul National University, May 2010
Best Presentation Award, Korean Institute of Chemical Engineer, October 2008
